---
title: "constants.ts"
---

## High-level description
This file defines a constant `metriportEmail` which represents the email address used for Carequality related communications.

## References
This constant is referenced in `packages/api/src/external/carequality/command/cq-directory/create-or-update-cq-organization.ts` and `packages/api/src/external/carequality/__tests__/cq.register-facility.test.ts`.

## Symbols

### `metriportEmail`
#### Description
This constant stores the email address "engineering+carequality@metriport.com" which is used for Carequality related communications.

#### Internal Logic
The constant is assigned a string literal value.
